alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Susquehanna, western Luzerne, eastern Bradford and Wyoming Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wysox to Wilburton Number Two. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Nanticoke, Plymouth, Vernon, West Hazleton, Larksville, Rush, Lehman and Dallas. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
